thread.title: Rocky Brands, Inc. to Report First Quarter 2018 Results on April 24, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Rocky Brands, Inc. to Report First Quarter 2018 Results on April 24, 2018
text:
NELSONVILLE, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Rocky Brands, Inc. (NASDAQ:RCKY) today announced that the company will release its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, after the market close on Tuesday, April 24, 2018. Management will host a conference call that afternoon (April 24, 2018) at 4:30 p.m. ET to discuss the financial results.
Investors and analysts interested in participating in the call are invited to dial (201) 689-8427. The conference call will also be available to interested parties through a live webcast at www.rockybrands.com . Please visit the website and select the “Investors” link at least 15 minutes prior to the start of the call to register and download any necessary software.
A telephone replay of the call will be available until May 3, 2018, by dialing (201) 612-7415 and entering the conference identification number: 13678973.
About Rocky Brands, Inc.
Rocky Brands, Inc. is a leading designer, manufacturer and marketer of premium quality footwear and apparel marketed under a portfolio of well recognized brand names including Rocky®, Georgia Boot®, Durango®, Lehigh®, and the licensed brand Michelin®.
